resources.string: Inviting Critics to Your Restaurants can be a great way to improve your Critics Score, let your community know you are improving and help you to make new Customers.
The Unique "Invite Critics" feature of this app will allow you to reach out you to all users in your area at once. This will bring dozens or Hundreds of Restaurant Food Critics to your Tables .
Before You can send out an invite you must setup the invite. Offer Critics as discount Coupon or a free desert for Presenting their Critic Review of Your Restaurant
